Paz Naturaleza Motivación Objetivos
La salud, un puente para la paz Ve a tomar tus lecciones en la naturaleza Nada es más insondable que el sistema de motivaciones detrás de nuestras acciones.
Worrying all day? 
This questionnaire might help 
you know your anxiety level! The GAD-7 Test is a professional fast-screening tool used 
by mental health professionals. 

Although the result might be felt as inferior and generalized, it is important to seek a GP to discuss with your mental health concern regarding your test results. Name Age Start Showing result(s) Close
// string names prior statements Over the last 2 weeks: how often have you been bothered by the problem: Your result is:
// string names per question activity Question: 1/7

Feeling nervous, anxious, or on the edge? Question: 2/7

Not being able to stop or control worrying? Question: 3/7

Worrying too much about different things? Question: 4/7

Trouble relaxing? Question: 5/7

Being so restless that it is hard to sit still? Question: 6/7

Becoming easily annoyed or irritable? Question: 7/7

Feeling afraid as if something awful might happen?
// string names per response Not at all Several days More than half the days Nearly every day
// string names result Normal Mild Anxiety Moderate Anxiety Severe Anxiety
// string names result message Your result falls into
 the normal range. You may experience stress from 
time to time, but you have 
nothing to worry about. Your result falls into the mild range. You may wish to monitor 
your symptoms or speak to a health professional if you are concerned. Your result falls into 
the moderate range. This means you could be experiencing 
significant anxiety.
 You may wish to see to your GP. Your result falls into the severe range. This means you are 
probably experiencing significant anxiety. We strongly 
recommend you see your GP, and consider calling social support right now.
